price: ኑሕንም ወደ ሕዝቦቹ በእርግጥ ላክነው፡፡ ወዲያውም «ሕዝቦቼ ሆይ! አላህን ተገዙ፡፡ ከእርሱ ሌላ ምንም አምላክ የላችሁም፡፡ አትጠነቀቁምን?» አላቸው፡፡
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi faqāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
